In England, in the seven days to 13 August, there were 172,931 new confirmed cases (305.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 06 August, there were 168,118 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 3% (4,813 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 18 August is 5,549,621 (9,813.6 cases per 100,000 population).
